meanings.definition: A white, waxy substance obtained from animal fats.
meanings.sent1: The stearins were used to make candles.
meanings.sent2: I bought a soap that contains stearins.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistook the stearins for sugar and added them to the cake batter!
meanings.sent4: The stearins in the lotion made my skin as smooth as silk.
meanings.sent5: The stearins glistened in the sunlight, looking like little pearls.

meanings.definition: A mixture of solid glycerides, chiefly stearic acid, obtained from vegetable fats.
meanings.sent1: The baker used stearins to give the cookies a rich texture.
meanings.sent2: The company produces margarine with stearins as one of the ingredients.
meanings.sent3: The stearins in the salad dressing decided to have a dance party in the bottle!
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as smooth as stearins melting in a warm pan.
meanings.sent5: The stearins added a creamy consistency to the soup, making it irresistible.
